clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of SKY on Psychosocial Parameters of Type 2 Diabetic Patients After a 12 Week Intervention
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of SKY on Anxiety, Depression and Quality of Life of Type 2 Diabetic Patients After a 12 Week Intervention in a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Sudarshan Kriya Yoga intervention has effect on the quality of life , anxiety and depression of Type 2 Diabetic Patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
Diabetes is a psychologically and behaviorally demanding disease; therefore psychosocial factors are relevant to nearly all aspects of its management. Research findings have demonstrated that depression is more common in patients with diabetes than in the general population, at least 15 % of patients have clinical depression.Yoga is a mind-body alternative therapy which can be used to prevent and treat type 2 diabetes mellitus and related complications.
Sudarshan kriya Yoga is a unique yogic breathing practices which involves several types of cyclical breathing patterns, ranging from slow and calming to rapid and stimulating. It is recommended for relaxation, stress management, control of psycho physiological states and to improve organ function. Investigator will recruit 50 type 2 diabetic patient and those who consent will be randomized into two groups. Interventional group and waitlist control group. Interventional group will be provided with SKY yoga for 5 days for a duration of 3 hours and trained to practice SKY yoga at home for 12 week. Participants will be coming for long SKY yoga during the weekend. At baseline questionnaire on anxiety, depression and quality of life will be provided to them. After 12 week of Yoga the participants will be asked to fill up the questionnaire again. Primary outcome will be pre to post intervention change in the mental health and quality of life.

primary_outcome.description: change in score of Questionnaires on anxiety at 12 week of yoga intervention

secondary_outcome.description: Change in HbA1c value at 12 week of yoga intervention
Change in BMI at 12 week of yoga intervention
Change in lipid levels at 12 week of yoga intervention

arm_group.description: Sudarshan Kriya Yoga will be provided to the experimental participants. This group will be provided with SKY yoga along with standard treatment. The intervention group will be provided with yoga training for 5 days and then asked to perform the SKY at home daily till 12 week. The questionnaire on anxiety, depression and quality of life will be administered at the baseline and at the end of 12 week. Also biochemical parameters such as HbA1c, lipid profile, fasting glucose and post meal glucose will be measured at baseline and after 12 week of intervention.

Control group will continue the standard treatment of care and recommended exercise by the physician. After a waiting period, SKY yoga will be provided to this group. Baseline questionnaire on anxiety, depression and quality of life will be obtained from the control group. Also biochemical parameters such as HbA1c, lipid profile, fasting glucose and post meal glucose will be measured at baseline and after 12 week of intervention.

intervention.description: Sudarshan Kriya Yoga is a rhythmic breathing exercise with slow and fast breath at a particular pace.It is recommended for stress management as yoga is a mind body control tool. SKY is having effect on multiple organ thus causing the positive effect.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria
1. Patients showing stress as per the stress indicators.
2. Patients of both gender of age 30 to 65 years on oral anti diabetic agents
3. Patient is able to perform yoga postures and breathing exercise.
4. Patient is able to consent for the study.
5. Patient should be able to understand English as that is the medium used.
Exclusion criteria
1. Bipolar disorder
2. Antidepressant drugs
3. Type 1 diabetes
4. Pregnancy
5. Any acute coronary symptoms in past 6 months
6. Artificial pace-maker
7. Previous (SKY) or any type of spiritual meditation practiced within 6 months
